about_the_game:
Delicious! Nutritious! MALICIOUS!

Rebbecca Valentine is a raccoon with quite the appetite. This game takes place in the corrupt, poorly run company that is her stomach. You play as a lowly worker cell, and perform the dangerous duty of breaking up the food Rebbecca eats with your acid blaster. Keep up with Rebbecca's eating habits, as this is supposed to be an iron stomach, and your Boss expects results--and she's not gonna be happy if you fail and make Rebbecca sick!

Hunger Pangs!! Bust a Gut, Bros!

GutBuster is a classic arcade-style shooter, with hand-drawn animations and satirical comedy about corporate greed, the digestive system, and erotic gluttony. Controls are simple: just run, while the gun shoots upwards automatically! Run and use your dodge-roll ability to avoid the food targets as you blast, so you don't get crushed! This is a challenging, yet casual game where you can continue as many times as you want. Accessibility options are available if you want to make it easier, or just want to see the story. 

It's 'Zyme Time!

Bust open Enzymes to acquire one of five different Power-Ups to help you fight harder and get bonuses. Bust'em up quickly with the Bile Blaster! Use Tri-Glycerides to spread out your shot! Use the power of thirst to slow down targets with Osmosis! Protect yourself and counterattack with the spiny Cell Wall! Or make yourself rich with the outpouring of lipids from a Hormone Spike!

Fatten Your Wallet, Too!

Collect lipids, then spend them at the shop to upgrade your blaster, make power-ups last longer, increase the appearance of lipids and enzymes, or even divide yourself for extra lives, and increase your odds of survival in this escalating challenge through 40 fattening levels, as the difficulty increases along with Rebbecca's weight!

Help Rebbecca to overcome any eating challenge, and don't give her indigestion!

WARNING: This game is meant for a mature audience. While there is no nudity or graphic depictions of sex in this game, it has content regarding fat furry gluttony, weight gain, sensual overeating, and references to other paraphilia, which may be discomforting or disturbing to some viewers, as well as language and subject matter that is not appropriate for young audiences. 

This is only a 10-level demo. In the full version, you'll find:

  • Classic arcade run-and-gun gameplay!

  • Five different power-ups to help win the fight!

  • Robust upgrade system to increase your powers!

  • Hand-drawn art and animation made by RoyalJellySandwich!

  • Hilarious skits and cutscenes, all written by RoyalJellySandwich!

  • An original soundtrack with a variety of different music styles, composed by (you guessed it) RoyalJellySandwich!

  • An overstuffed, 8-Chapter story spanning 40 levels!

  • Accessibility options, including invincibility and shop discounts, along with full customization, so you can play the game the way you want to!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: GutBuster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Demo Version. Digest the ravenous Rebbecca's meals in this arcade style run and gun erotic comedy game. Dodge and blast the chewed food, collect powerups, and spend lipids at the upgrade shop to survive the challenge and prevent indigestion! For mature players.
